tool_description: There is an API which allows you to receive random quotes from a large collection of inspirational quotes, thought-provoking quotes, and motivational quotes, all curated for you by our team.
name: Famous Movie Quotes
title: Famous Movie Quotes

api_list.name: Get Random Movie Quotes
api_list.description: This API allows you to fetch a random quote from a curated collection of inspiring, thought-provoking, and motivational quotes.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://famous-movie-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/api/random-movie-quote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "famous-movie-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://famous-movie-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/api/random-movie-quote"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "famous-movie-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
